title.rendered: Herba Hair Wash 200 ML Smoothening and Repairing for Damaged and Weak Hair

content.rendered:
• Enriched with a potent blend of 12 Ayurvedic herbs, this hair wash offers a comprehensive solution for cleansing and nurturing your hair.
  • The gentle formulation ensures effective cleansing without stripping away the natural oils, maintaining a healthy balance and preventing excessive dryness.
  • Shikakai, Aritha, and Neem work in harmony to provide natural cleansing, removing impurities, excess oil, and promoting a healthy scalp.
  • Aloe vera adds a touch of hydration, ensuring that your hair retains moisture and remains soft and manageable.

Benefits:

  • Supports Intensive Hair Repair
  • Helps to Restores Moisture Balance
  • Soothes Scalp Irritation
  • Helps to Promote Stronger & Healthier Hair.

Direction of use: Apply 3 ml of hair lotion to the scalp, foam, and wash the hair. Repeat if required.

 Ingredients: Amla, Shikakal, Aritha, Bhringral, Methi seeds, Kalon|l seeds|, Neem leaves, Aloevera Pulp, Henna leaves, Jaswant Icaves, Betel leaves, Curry Leaves, Fragrance qs, SLS.

Legal Disclaimer: Natural herbal formulations tend to change color over time. However, product efficacy remains unchanged
